resources.string:
Developer: Martyn Haigh
Version: %s
Inspired by: http://xkcd.com/743/

To Seren: I still win :)

string-array.name: whatsNew
string-array.item: The included songs were way too quiet, so I made them louder!
NEW! Select your own song, or let the app select from one of the three bundled songs
